insert into cr_wms.cr_goods_class (id, create_name, create_by, create_date, update_name, update_by, update_date, sys_org_code, sys_company_code, goods_class_code, goods_class_name) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.createName}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateName}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.sysOrgCode}, #{item.sysCompanyCode}, #{item.goodsClassCode}, #{item.goodsClassName})

insert into cr_wms.cr_goods_class (id, create_name, create_by, create_date, update_name, update_by, update_date, sys_org_code, sys_company_code, goods_class_code, goods_class_name) values (#{id}, #{createName}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateName}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{sysOrgCode}, #{sysCompanyCode}, #{goodsClassCode}, #{goodsClassName}) on duplicate key update id = #{id}, create_name = #{createName}, create_by = #{createBy}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_name = #{updateName}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, sys_org_code = #{sysOrgCode}, sys_company_code = #{sysCompanyCode}, goods_class_code = #{goodsClassCode}, goods_class_name = #{goodsClassName}
